name: nativescript-health-data
description: Health Data plugin for Nativescript, using Google Fit and Apple HealthKit.

scripts.test.android: npm i && npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo-ng && tns build android && tns test android --justlaunch
scripts.test.ios: npm i && npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo-ng && tns build ios && tns test ios --justlaunch
scripts.plugin.link: npm link && cd ../demo-ng && npm link nativescript-health-data && cd ../src
scripts.demo.ios: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run ios
scripts.demo.android: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run android
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && cd ../demo-ng && rm -rf hooks node_modules platforms && cd ../src && npm run plugin.link
scripts.demo.ng.ios: npm i && npm run tsc && npm run package && cd ../demo-ng && tns plugin remove nativescript-health-data && tns plugin add ../publish/package/*.tgz && tns run ios
scripts.demo.ng.android: npm i && npm run tsc && npm run package && cd ../demo-ng && tns plugin remove nativescript-health-data && tns plugin add ../publish/package/*.tgz && tns run android
scripts.plugin.ng.link: npm link && cd ../demo-ng && npm link nativescript-health-data && cd ../src
scripts.setup: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo-ng && npm i
